请确认是否解绑设备，确认则解除对设备解绑。: Please confirm whether to unbind the device, and unbind the device if confirmed.
正在取出到您的钱包中,请勿操作: Withdrawing into your wallet, please do not operate
Withdrawal to wallet successful.The data display may be delayed, please refresh the data display later
暂无NFT，请添加NFT至钱包: No NFT, please add NFT to the wallet
正在存入到您的设备中,请勿操作: Depositing in your device, please do not operate.
NFT存入已发起申请: NFT deposit application has been initiated
请耐心等待，交易进行中...请您刷新页面进行获取最新交易进程。: Please be patient, the transaction is in progress...Please refresh the page to get the latest transaction progress.
请点击页面右下角“…”找到“重新加载”更新该页面: Please click "..." at the bottom right corner of the page to find "Reload" to refresh the page
暂时不支持这种类型的NFT存入到设备: This type of NFT is temporarily not supported for depositing to the device

选择: in the upper left corner and select

按钮: button in the upper right corner

第二步：扫码绑定成功: Step 2: Scan code and bind successfully
第一步：进入钱包主页，点击右上角扫一扫: Step 1:Go to the wallet home page, click the top right corner to scan
请选择至少两张图片: Please select at least two NFT
轮播图设置完成!: The rotation chart setting is completed!
轮播图时间间隔设置完成!: The rotation chart interval setting is completed!
您只能查看在其他网络的NFT，不能进行任何操作，若您想把其他网络的NFT绑定到设: You can only view NFTs in other networks and cannot do anything. If you want to bind NFTs in other networks to devices, you need to switch to the network where the NFT is located before binding the NFT to devices
您只能查看在其他网络的NFT，不能进行任何操作，若您想把其他网络的NFT取出到钱: You can only view NFTs on other networks and cannot do anything. If you want to take NFTs from other networks out of your wallet, you need to switch to the network where the NFT is located before you can take the NFT out of your wallet
请复制或扫码输入钱包地址: copy or scan the code to enter the wallet address
请使用钱包扫码功能扫描设备屏幕二维码: Please use the wallet scanning function to scan the QR code on the device screen
您还未绑定任何设备，请右翻查看绑定设备操作步骤: You haven't bound any devices yet. Please turn right to view the operation steps of binding devices
The data is running, please wait patiently...
Adjusting the screen angle will restart the device, please confirm.
开关：显示/隐藏NFT信息和详情二维码: Switch: show / hide NFT info and detail QR code
确定取消本次投屏吗？: Are you sure to cancel this screen projection?
开关：开启/关闭自动调整屏幕亮度: Turn on / off automatic screen brightness adjustment
每次获取验证码需间隔1分钟以上，请勿频繁操作`, '验证码发送太频繁: Every time you get the verification code, the interval should be more than 1 minute. Do not operate frequently. 'the verification code is sent too frequently
已有用户发起请求，请稍后尝试: A user has initiated a request. Please try later
设备繁忙请稍后再试: The device is busy. Please try again later
调整屏幕角度将重启设备，确定调整屏幕角度吗？: Adjusting the screen angle will restart the device. Are you sure to adjust the screen angle?
